title: Mutton hotpot with heritage carrots
description: Mutton might not be as popular as it once was, but it's the traditional - and most flavouful - meat to use in hotpots. Using the rendered suet fat from around the kidney adds even more taste.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz boneless leg of mutton, cut into 2.5cm/1in pieces
2 large onions, cut into thick slices
900g/2lb potatoes, peeled and cut into 5mm/¼in thick slices
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
